transform_def.name: designed23
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = cos(abs(p_in.x) + abs(p_in.y)) t = tan(length(p_in * s * r) * length(p_in / p_in.x)) u = tan(length(p_in * s * r) * length(p_in / p_in.y)) v = if r > s then t else u z = v * tan((p_in.x + p_in.y) - (p_in.x - p_in.y)) * (r * halfpi()) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
